typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		{department } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceEmployee
SourceEmployee alterRow(upsertIf(1 == 1)) ~> AlterRowSCDType1
AlterRowSCDType1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SCDType1sink
